body.bibl: Pallikunnath, Xaviour F. “Ruḥā d-Qudšā Sanctifies the Mystery of Priesthood: A Pneumatological Inquiry into the East Syriac Ordination Liturgies of Diaconate, Priesthood and Episcopate with a Particular Reference to the Present Syro-Malabar Pontifical.” Laurentianum 55:1 (2014): 189–96.
